2010-07-20

30 Days of Buffy: Day 15 - Favourite Male Villain

If you've made it this far through my 30 Days of Buffy you'll be very unsurprised to discover that my...

Favourite Male Villain is, of course, Mayor Richard Wilkins

"But on the other hand, heck, maybe we won. And right now, I'm on some jumbo monitor in the Richard Wilkins Museum, surrounded by a bunch of kids sitting Indian-style and looking up at my face, filled with fear and wonder. Hi, kids!"
